__e: I have taken down your company, taken over your home, and now...
You got in over your head, and I can see how that can happen.
I've only just taken over the house from my father, so I'm very protective of it.
I assume that he had a partner who did the driving.
Or maybe that's why he took the case.
I still don't understand exactly what you think this person took over.
Well, you ask me, it's a good thing you took over her body.
They aren't here to speak for themselves because you did all the speaking for them!
You took over her body, it doesn't make you her.
Um, but it's okay, because I'll be looking after all of his patients.
Yeah, well, sometimes I wonder if I've bitten off more than I can chew.
Listen, I'm really sorry for co-opting your idea, and I'd like to offer you a job.
The only question is, did you take his room as soon as he left? - Or did he leave because you took his room?
I'm shocked, with your record defending the poor and oppressed, that you've taken this case.
Well, maybe if you knew that, it's why you took the case.
